original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1206)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(831)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並召喚 <color=#ccffcc>22</color> 隻<color=#4cc769>猛虎衛士</color>加入我軍。<color=#4cc769>猛虎衛士</color>屬性<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1211)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1211)@</color>
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1206)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(831)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage on the enemy in front of you, and summons <color=#ccffcc>22</color> only <color=#4cc769> Tiger Guards</color> to join our army. <color=#4cc769> Tiger Guardian</color> Attributes <color=#FFE787>Physical strength: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1211)@</color> <color=#FFE787>War: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1211)@</color>
